```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)
library(readr)

normalize <- function(x) {
    return ((x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x)))
}
```


# Load and process

```{r, message=FALSE}
name <- "../data/sweep_test3.csv"
results <- read_csv(paste(name, sep=""))

rm(name)
```


# Overall distributions

```{r, fig.width=2.5, fig.height=1.5}
results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=variances)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) + 
  xlab("Variance") +
  theme_classic() -> p1

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=errors)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) + 
  xlab("Error") +
  theme_classic() -> p2

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc/V_b)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
  xlab("Vc/Vb (volt)") +
  theme_classic() -> p3

results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_comp/V_b)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
  xlab("Vo/Vb (volt)") +
  theme_classic() -> p4

grid.arrange(p1, p2, p3, p4, nrow=2)
rm(p1, p2, p3, p4)
```
